website_summaries.verdict: This supplement delivers quick results. If it doesn't work for you, you can get your money back.
pros: Contains B vitamins and some minerals in addition to a variety of stress-relieving herbs
Users typically notice an improvement within a day or two
cons: Serving size is 2 capsules per day

customer_reviews.title: Natural Stress Relief!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like taking a lot of medications and try to find natural remedies when ever possible. However, I do fight anxiety and panic attacks that I have been taking prescription meds for. Adding this supplement daily has greatly decreased my anxiety to the point that I hope to discontinue or decrease the prescription. Great for calming nerves!
customer_reviews.author: scrap girl

customer_reviews.title: Really helps curb anxiety!
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with depression and anxiety when I was 16. I was prescribed several different medications that made me feel sick or made me act like a zombie. I quit taking my prescriptions when I was 20 and have been looking for a good vitamin that would help. I really like this product! I no longer wake up feeling anxious and it keeps my mood level during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Flint

customer_reviews.title: This has helped me
customer_reviews.text: I have found this helpful so far. I get tight muscles in my neck and shoulder from driving and stress, this has taken away the tightness. I took Tylenol and it didn't help. I took this and noticed later that the tightness was gone and have been using it everyday since and have found it helpful.
customer_reviews.author: barbv

customer_reviews.title: It works 👍
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on these for almost 2 weeks I’ve always had bad anxiety heart racing Over thinking not focused Keep forgetting what I was supposed to do always stressed on what’s next But after trying these my reactions to situations have totally changed I’ve been more calm, patient, focused even more energetic I think I’ll be stuck on these 👍 I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mahendra S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Me!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle of this product and as a person struggling with generalized anxiety, it has helped me immensely. I have been able to cut down significantly on using my "as needed" medication to assist me in controlling my anxiety and I have not experienced a panic attack since starting.... By No means, am I saying this a substitute for prescribed medication - I am merely stating what my experience has been while using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: One capsule melts stress away
customer_reviews.text: This product eases stress and most of the ingredients I have been taking like camomile and GABA but combined in one capsule makes it much more convenient
customer_reviews.author: Lareda wilder

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very great product! I’ve battled anxiety for 9 years and this is the first natural supplement I have found that actually helps me!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Slone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product that truly reduces anxiety! Both my husband and daughter take it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely aided in a better nights rest and improved mood thru the day!
customer_reviews.author: ccob

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I will be buying this product again. It really helps with anxiety, and insomnia. And actually I have energy and feel healthy again.
customer_reviews.author: Khristina Martin

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with my purchase and it came fast also
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them for 2 days so far, but I notice a difference in my anxiety level already. I'm very happy with my purchase and it came fast also.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kolb

customer_reviews.title: Love this product. Helps my stress and helps manage weight as well. thank you
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Helps my stress and helps manage weight as well. thank you. I need to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Goeden

customer_reviews.title: Helped me
customer_reviews.text: This product is no joke. I honestly felt better the very first day I took these. I definitely recommend these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Jason Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Drink a full glass/bottle of water when you take it.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this for almost 2 weeks now and I really think it's helping with anxiety and mood. I can tell a difference already and am pleased. No side effects so far, i have noticed my appetite has lessened and I've lost a few pounds but that's a plus!! ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has to be taken daily to feel calming effects
customer_reviews.text: Great product. All natural ingredients. I noticed taken daily my stress and anxiety levels have lowered.
customer_reviews.author: natalie niles

customer_reviews.title: Helps me feel calm!
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely feel a difference when I take this, it mellows me out and makes me feel calm.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Works well for Over The Counter
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my wife for her occasional anxiety and panic attacks. Helps her quite a bit and not habit forming. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Fiorito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This supplement helped my son alot, he said after his first dose he could tell the difference in how he felt.
customer_reviews.author: beerhone

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product. No negative side effects!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Feel more levelheaded and less likely to snap at coworkers!
customer_reviews.author: Annika James

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this product and started using it and I can already tell a difference! I feel less anxious and more productive in my day to day life! Will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped with stress and anxiety. I have a very stressful job and overall feel more relaxed and positive.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelle

customer_reviews.title: Did not feel any change
customer_reviews.text: I did not find much difference while taking this to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Khalid

customer_reviews.title: Taking 2 capsules per dose can give you the gitters. At least in my experience
customer_reviews.text: Good product used it for anxiety. I believe it works
customer_reviews.author: T a.

customer_reviews.title: Mom says Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mom, she hates taking her anti-anxiety meds. She asked for a second bottle of these. We were trying to get her to take the main ingredients in many pills. She is 80, and one tablet seemed to be less intimidating and more manageable. So far, so good. I would recommend to those looking for an alternative to pharmaceuticals. She is also taking daily Hemp CBD.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: It did give me a bit of calm during my anxiety filled work days however, the reason for the one star is the label on the top of the bottle cap. I boldly states " GET YOUR NEXT BOTTLE FREE" has a website printed below. I have tried numerous times to get this "free" bottle and every time I do, the site asks for a credit card to keep on file for the next time I order it. Very bad. If you have a good product, you certainly don't need to offer more of it for free with a huge catch. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: linfield

customer_reviews.title: Big improvement to my life
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a time and it does help take the edge off of my anxiety. I use it in conjunction with the elimination of social media from my life and frequent exercise to include combat sports. Being a combat veteran several times over I have benefited from anti anxiety supplements and this has improved the quality of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Dustan W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Helped me get back to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to help me stop ruminating and helped me go back to sleep when I would wake up worrying.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi L. McLain

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this product. As someone who has struggled with anxiety my whole life, I have found this product to be the most efficient and fast acting.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Work
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work. I can't say I "feel" it working, but I do notice a difference in my behavior when I take it and when I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: A great alternative to dangerous prescription drugs. No side effects, all natural, and WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Licha

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Helped out a lot with me being nervous. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: LDuncan

customer_reviews.title: Great results so far
customer_reviews.text: Only been using a week and I can tell a difference in the calming effect. Will continue to use
customer_reviews.author: Traci S. Gordon

product_meta.title: Premium Anxiety Relief - Stress Support Supplement with Ashwagandha to Soothe & Relax, Memory & Cognitive Function, Reduce Stress by Increasing Serotonin Without Feeling Tired - 60 Veg Caps
